title: Wedding Celebration
description: A beautiful wedding celebration with family and friends. The wedding ceremony will take place at a picturesque outdoor venue, surrounded by lush gardens and a serene lake. Guests will be treated to an exquisite five-course meal, live music, and a dance floor under the stars. Join us in celebrating this special day filled with love, laughter, and unforgettable moments. Dress code: Formal attire.

title: Birthday Party
description: A fun-filled birthday party with cake and games. It's time to blow out the candles and make a wish! Join us for a fantastic birthday celebration with family and friends. We'll have a delicious birthday cake, exciting games, and lots of surprises. Don't forget to bring your party spirit and a big smile. Let's make this birthday unforgettable!, this event promises an unforgettable experience. Grad!

title: Anniversary Celebration
description: Celebrate love and commitment at our romantic anniversary celebration. This special evening will include a candlelit dinner for two, accompanied by live music and a breathtaking view of the city skyline. Whether you're celebrating your own anniversary or joining us to mark a significant milestone in the lives of loved ones, this event promises an unforgettable experience.

title: Engagement Party
description: Join us for a joyful engagement party as we celebrate the love and commitment of [Couple's Names]. This special occasion will feature a champagne toast, hors d'oeuvres, and live music. Witness the exchange of engagement rings and share in the happiness of this momentous event. Dress code: Cocktail attire.

title: Retirement Party
description: It's time to bid farewell to a dear colleague who has dedicated [number of years] to our organization. Join us for a heartfelt retirement party as we honor their remarkable career. The evening will include speeches, a retirement cake, and a gift presentation. Let's celebrate the achievements.

title: Baby Shower
description: Welcome the newest addition to our family with a joyous baby shower. This event is all about celebrating the soon-to-arrive bundle of joy! Join us for games, laughter, and delicious treats. We'll also have a gift-opening session where you can share your love and best wishes for the baby and parents.
